name: Enemies With Benefits
description:
Enemies with Benefits is an online party game that consists of multiple minigames with an emphasis on the strategies of building trust and plotting betrayal. The game offers players opportunities to either use teamwork or betrayal to get ahead.

Gameplay

Gameplay consists of several minigames which players must navigate through to progress and earn points.

Each minigame provides opportunities for players to co-operate with each other or hinder each other’s progress. A winner is selected at the end of the game based on their number of points.

The player can make use of simple movement controls to traverse levels. The player can ragdoll to avoid oncoming dangers and can punch other players to knock them out. There are many interactable objects for the player to use also to aid their progression or hinder other players.

Players earn points based on their progress in levels and a victor is chosen after a set of minigames.

How To Play

This is an online multiplayer game that requires 2-4 players. Follow the manual included in the zip file to play the game.
